metadata.title: CVE-2022-3886 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Speech Recognition in Google Chrome prior to107.0.5304.106 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heapcorruption via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
